verses.name: Genesis 4:20
verses.text: And Adah bare Jabal: he was the father of such as dwell in tents, and of such as have cattle.

verses.name: Genesis 4:21
verses.text: And his brother’s name was Jubal: he was the father of all such as handle the harp and organ.

verses.name: Genesis 4:22
verses.text: And Zillah, she also bare Tubal–cain, an instructer of every artificer in brass and iron: and the sister of Tubal–cain was Naamah.

verses.name: Genesis 4:23
verses.text: And Lamech said unto his wives, Adah and Zillah, Hear my voice; ye wives of Lamech, hearken unto my speech: for I have slain a man to my wounding, and a young man to my hurt.
